Headline: #72 North Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Avenue/Laramie
ShortDescription: Westbound #72 North buses are rerouted via North Avenue, Cicero, Division, Central and North Avenue, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Cicero, Division, Central, then resume normal route on North Avenue, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
